thread.title: An excellent Hotel in Downtown Paris - Review
thread.title_full: An excellent Hotel in Downtown Paris - Review of Hotel Excelsior Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jose A
title: An excellent Hotel in Downtown Paris - Review
text: The hotel has everything one needs to have a good rest and time. It is located in a vibrant area of downtown Paris, with plenty of restaurants, entertainment and shopping stores around.The staff are welcoming and helpful and the breakfast offered is excellent.
